snippet: On his way to South Korea, Pope Francis will get a rare opportunity to directly address China's leadership as he flies over the country, whose communist government does not allow Catholics to recognize his authority....

headline.print_headline: Pope's South Korea Trip Gives Opportunity to Reach Out to China
headline.main: Pope's South Korea Trip Gives Opportunity to Reach Out to China

lead_paragraph: On his way to South Korea, Pope Francis will get a rare opportunity to directly address China's leadership as he flies over the country, whose communist government does not allow Catholics to recognize his authority.
